author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ladbrokes Coral Group Says Full Year Group Operating Profit Was At Top End Of Management Expectations​
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Gvc Holdings Plc:
* ‍FULL YEAR GROUP OPERATING PROFIT WAS AT TOP END OF MANAGEMENT EXPECTATIONS​
* ‍FULL YEAR GROUP NET REVENUE +4%​ * ‍SECOND INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 4P ANNOUNCED​ * ‍TOTAL GROUP NET REVENUE WAS 12% AHEAD OF LAST YEAR​ * ‍BOARD DOES NOT INTEND TO DECLARE A FINAL DIVIDEND FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍CONDITIONAL UPON ACQUISITION BEING APPROVED AT LADBROKES CORAL SHAREHOLDER MEETINGS, DRIP WILL BE CANCELLED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
